summary:
May contain spoilers but only if you live under a rock.
Imagine...
Moving in with Maria and Monica after Carol dies. Carol had...
body:
Carol Danvers #1

May contain spoilers but only if you live under a rock.

Imagine…

Moving in with Maria and Monica after Carol dies. Carol had been your guardian since she turned 18, having grown up around your brothers and Father Carol hated to think what they would do to the small girl who had more fire rushing through her veins then she had had herself. When Carol showed up again after such a long time everyone was shocked. It was like a bomb had gone off and it was still ringing in their ears so many years later, only to be informed that bomb was a fire cracker in reality. Vers… or Carol didn’t remember the sister she had left behind that day, even so she was hurt that the blonde teenager didn’t embrace her. “It’s hard, after 6 years of tears and mourning with nothing to say goodbye to… for you to just show up.” Y/N whispered somewhat aggressively while leaning against the door frame still trying to process what she was seeing.

Over time the 9 year old girl had turned into a young lady, Maria + Monica had become her family. Well more of a family then they were before. The pain had faded over time and was now just a dull ache, like she was missing something but couldn’t quite put her finger on it. Y/N knew life would never be the same again, well how can it when your sister can glow! Let alone fly and shoot fire from her fists. Aliens were real.. but maybe it was because she was a Danvers (well probably not) but now her eyes were open to all the possibilities out there, all the planets and galaxies that might need help. “Right then when do we leave.” Pushing of the oak frame jumping into action, turning to face the adults and well Aliens in the room. Shocked at the sudden noise that broke the silence everyone turned to face the Teen. Maria shook her head slowly “You’re not going!” Disbelief tripping from the woman. “Oh yeah! Who’s gonna stop me.”

Gif Source

We heart it

Pinterest

summary: I'm so fucking tired of ppl pulling arguments outta their asses as to why men didn't oppose to Wonder Woman as they did to...
question: I'm so fucking tired of ppl pulling arguments outta their asses as to why men didn't oppose to Wonder Woman as they did to Captain Marvel, it's always them shitting on Brie Larson for no reason or just plain dumbass statements they think are compelling my goddd shut the fuck up already. Men didn't say shit about Wonder Woman because they thought it was gonna fail so they didn't throw tantrums on the internet. Plus they CHOSE to misinterpret what Brie said bout diversity just to shit on her
answer:
Dude, they’re so fucking stupid. They underestimated Wonder Woman’s success and now that they know it did amazing, they’re going to hold every female led superhero movie after that to a crazy standard. It’s what men do. They never think what we do is enough. They want us to jump over hurdles and through hoops constantly. Now that Captain Marvel, a woman who doesn’t give a shit about what men think, comes out and so many people loved it, THEY’RE ANGRY. They don’t love that Carol wasn’t all smiles and sweetness and sex. It also didn’t fit their stupid standards. I hate that any movie with a female lead has to do AMAZING in order for people to accept it and even then, they’ll nit pick the shit out of it. Also, I wouldn’t be surprised if some of those men must be the same ones who are pro DC and anti-Marvel too, so they’re just finding ways to tear this down.

Give it a fucking rest, you losers.

Also, I wouldn’t be surprised if some of those men must be the same ones who are pro DC and anti-Marvel too, so they’re just finding ways to tear this down.

Give it a fucking rest, you losers.

tags: nick fury believes in carol danvers
summary: I sincerely hope the Endgame trailers are just under playing Captain Marvel’s involvement and aren’t just teasing us with her...
body:
I sincerely hope the Endgame trailers are just under playing Captain Marvel’s involvement and aren’t just teasing us with her and she’ll only serve as a supporting role.

If Nick Fury paged Carol Danvers to fight Thanos after all the shit the Avengers have fought through, then she better have a good amount of screen time.
